title: MUG CAKES
directions: In a microwave-safe bowl, melt peanut butter and butter together until smooth.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, sweetener, and baking powder. Stir in the eggs, vanilla extract, melted peanut butter mixture and water until well combined. Stir in chocolate chips.
Divide among 6 ramekins or mugs and microwave each for 1 minute, until puffed and set. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1/3	cup Swerve Sweetener (OR 1 1/2 tbsp THM Sweet Blend)
